text: God sends crises in order to test and strengthen us. I cannot bear this burden for you.

We have no time for such frivolities.

We should enact laws to restrict the worshipping rights of these heretics.
The rulers of our neighbouring states should attend. Such an event is a useful display of our wealth and power.
